panel.html:
Incapsula Application For Splunk contains the following Content:
Incapsula Main Dashboard - General Statistic View
Incapsula Main Dashboard - High Severity - General Statistic View For All The High Alerts
INV Incapsula Dashboard - By Attack Name - Investigation Dashboard Base On The Attack Name
INV Incapsula Dashboard - By Attacker Address - Investigation Dashboard Base On The Attacker Address
Incapsula Map View
